title: IL-2 Sturmovik - Ultrapack 3.0 Release Candidate 4
description:
Original torrent provided by Birdman at http://raukorpi.mbnet.fi/ , uploaded here for convenience and to promote seeding. 

Ultrapack is basically a mod combination as it includes a huge list of smaller mods into one big convenient package for the acclaimed flight simulator IL-2 Strumovik. Please note that your game MUST already be patched to version 4.10.1m - if yours is an earlier version there is a convenient 'megapatch' that will update a CLEAN AND UNMODIFIED installation of any previous version of IL-2 Sturmovik here:
 
http://www.mission4today.com/index.php?name=downloads&file=details&id=4088

If you don't know what version you have, this can be easily found by starting the game and looking for the version number at the bottom-left or bottom-right corners of your screen as the program starts up. 

If you are a fan of the Ultrapack I HIGHLY suggest you seed this because as of 2015 the official UP website at http://ultrapack.tuttovola.org/ has ceased all notable activity. Development has stopped and the last post on the forums, which are now closed to registration, is from December of that year. This is the latest (and probably the last) official update to Ultrapack by the development team and the site may go offline at any time without warning
